title: Failed to load user profile
description: User profiles fail to load due to missing or corrupted data returned from the API. Affects login and personalization features.

title: Database connection timeout
description: The backend server fails to connect to the database within the expected time window, possibly caused by network latency or DB overload.

title: UI button not responding
description: Click events on certain UI buttons are not being registered, likely due to missing event listeners or overlapping elements in the layout.

title: Memory leak in background service
description: A background process continuously allocates memory without releasing it, leading to performance degradation over time.

title: User session expires too early
description: Sessions are expiring before the intended duration, forcing users to reauthenticate frequently. May be related to token TTL misconfiguration.

title: Notification not sent on error
description: Error-triggered notifications are not being sent to users or admins. Likely an issue with the error-handling or notification service.

title: New Bug
description: Recently reported issue requiring triage. Details pending investigation and reproduction steps.
